'''Derek Halligan''' is a Northern Irish actor. He has many stage credits, and is best-known on television for a recurring role in [[wikipedia:Hollyoaks|''Hollyoaks'']]. He played the supervillain Dr. Nightshade in ''Tonight We Fly''.

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' Halligan was originally announced as playing the role of Ser [[Alliser Thorne]]. He was confirmed in the role on 16 July 2010. On 18 August 2010 it was announced that Halligan had left the project for unspecified reasons. He was replaced by [[Owen Teale]].
